attributes.action: Strip Liverpool FC of the league title for failing to control fans
attributes.additional_details: Strip them of the league title for failing to control their fans!
attributes.background: This petition is in light of the recent events over the last two days of unacceptable levels of hysteria by Liverpool fans, with total disregard for the safety and well-being of other people in the community and the country!

rejection.details: The UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for the Premier league.
